messages.messageBody:
A video about urinals in a garden centre near us

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/7529962.stm

and a link to the guy who designed them in America

http://www.clarkmade.com/urinals.html

Jo

messages.subject: Links, please!  Mine: Toilets through the ages
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.show.me.uk/site/news/STO1206.html Someone just sent this to yahoogroups list called Medieval Trivia. It occurred to me that it might be fun for
messages.messageBody:
http://www.show.me.uk/site/news/STO1206.html

Someone just sent this to yahoogroups list called "Medieval Trivia."
It occurred to me that it might be fun for some other people here (and okay, maybe the kids, too).

If anyone else has a recent fun link in a one-thing-leads-to-another way that young kids might like, please leave it here.

I have a couple of collections on art, music and history (and some disappear, as links on the internet do, but some stay!):

http://sandradodd.com/art
http://sandradodd.com/music
http://sandradodd.com/history
